root.name: Dungeons, Amethysts, Alchemists 'n' Everythin'
root.description: StoryA dark lord called TITE-ARZ conquers the kingdom and installs a reign of terror (that increases inflation to 59% and causes general unemployment on the population). In order to defeat him, a mighty warrior must find the magical amethyst stone that was stolen from the alchemist's tower.
